column4: Ok I have a VERY strange Issue.  Anyone ever heard of Downloading 6.10 and it end up saying 6.06 when its' said and done?
isnt edgy 6.10?
My contents in the ISO reads ./dists/edgy/main/dist-upgrader/binary-all/edgy.tar.gz
Is there any other way to install an ISO if my CD-Rom Drive will NOT read the CD
there is one crazy way
VMWare and install ubuntu that way
well right now I cant get install onto my desktop cuz my CDRW will NOT read the CD-R but my laptop reads it perfectly and installs perfectly on the laptop jus tnot desktop
get it to use a physical partition
install vmware
then use the ISO file as a cdrom
I have VMWARE actually already instead
then use hard disk as a separate physical partion
then install from livecd
then boot from the physical raw hardware
and one working copy of ubuntu NOT inside vmware
but as I said it's crazy :p
but that still does not solve the issue of my ISO needing to be read from CD right?
it does solve it
VMWare can read the ISO file
and mount as a virtual CD
ohhh ok
